mapper.insert:
insert into sctrans.T_TS_TEAM_SCOPE
PKID,
YU_AGENT_TEAM_CODE,
YU_TEAM_CODE,
YU_AGENT_TEAM_NAME,
YU_TEAM_NAME,
#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{yuAgentTeamCode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{yuTeamCode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{yuAgentTeamName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{yuTeamName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TS_TEAM_SCOPE
YU_AGENT_TEAM_CODE = #{yuAgentTeamCode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
YU_TEAM_CODE = #{yuTeamCode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
YU_AGENT_TEAM_NAME = #{yuAgentTeamName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
YU_TEAM_NAME = #{yuTeamName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select scope.YU_AGENT_TEAM_CODE AS 'tsTeamScope.yuAgentTeamCode', scope.YU_AGENT_TEAM_NAME AS 'tsTeamScope.yuAgentTeamName', scope.YU_TEAM_CODE AS 'tsTeamScope.yuTeamCode', scope.YU_TEAM_NAME AS 'tsTeamScope.yuTeamName', property.IS_RESPONSE_TEAM AS 'tsTeamProperty.isResponseTeam' from sctrans.T_TS_TEAM_SCOPE scope INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TS_TEAM_PROPERTY property ON property.YU_TEAM_CODE = scope.YU_TEAM_CODE
AND scope.YU_AGENT_TEAM_CODE = #{yuAgentTeamCode}
